text: Is there any way how you can get info about new Conversations from the Web widget through API?

We want to deliver the same functionality as Slack integration has:
_Get notified in a designated Slack channel about *incoming chats from your website*_

Hey Everybody!
I’m using OAuth to connect HubSpot.
After I login via the login page, I’m not redirected to my `redirect_uri` , instead I’m logged in.
Although if I’m logged in already, then it redirects to my `redirect_uri`
 I use this url ->
```<https://app.HubSpot.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=xxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxx&scope=content%20contacts&redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2Flocalhost%3A3000%2Fdeploy%2FHubSpot&state=%7Cintegration>```
And the login page has this url ->
```<https://app.HubSpot.com/login/?loginRedirectUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.HubSpot.com%2Foauth%2Fauthorize%3Fclient_id%xxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxx%26scope%3Dcontent%2520contacts%26redirect_uri%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Flocalhost%253A3000%252Fdeploy%252FHubSpot%26state%3D%7Cintegration>```
Can someone help me please on this issue?

Are people generally still using the legacy APIs over the new ones for new apps?

It just seems like the new CRM API is pretty immature, lot’s of typos in the examples, missing import/include statements, etc. Tickets and properties don’t work -- even cutting and pasting the sample code (after fixing the syntax errors)

i still like the old v2 docs, and will continue to use them until they can't be used any more. The v3 stuff still (after all of this time) seems not quite ready for production use. But unfortunately i still need to use the v3 stuff for certain things.

I am using "<https://api.hubapi.com/oauth/v1/token>" to get the access token it works fine in post man and it take following value in the body
grant_type=authorization_code&client_id=xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx&client_secret=yyyyyyyy-yyyy-yyyy-yyyy-yyyyyyyyyyyy&redirect_uri=<https://www.example.com/&code=zzzzzzzz-zzzz-zzzz-zzzz-zzzzzzzzzzzz>
here you can see that it need code which is of type guid , but I am not able to get this code in C# web api (from where I am calling this )

I have to paste following URL in the browser to get code

<https://app.HubSpot.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx&redirect_uri=https://www.example.com/&scope=contacts>

how can I get this code in C# code ?
